ifo.title: Interferometers
ifo.text:
A clickable list of the interferometers that have data-quality flags available in DQSEGDB.

If the IFO is blue, then the flags related to it and available in DQSEGDB are displayed in the Flags section below. If the IFO is white, then the Flags are not listed.

flags.title: Flags
flags.text:
The Data Quality Flags available for the IFO that are currently selected in the row above.

A maximum of [MAX_FLAGS] Flags can be selected at any one time.

When a Flag is selected, it is moved into the Versions row below, and removed from the Flags list.

flag_versions.title: Flag Versions
flag_versions.text:
Any Flag selected in the Flags section above, automatically appears in the Versions list. By default, its Version #1 is selected, but the user can change this to select any other available Version.

n Versions can be associated to each Flag.

Flags and their associated Versions can be removed from this list by clicking on the red X button, available to the left of the Flag name.

gps_times.title: GPS Times
gps_times.text:
The GPS-time range-boundaries used to filter the segments.

Start and/or Stop GPS times can be provided.

include_history.title: Include history?
include_history.text:
Sets whether or not to include the insert_history dictionary for the Flag in the returned JSON payload.

This is only really required when investigating potential issues with a Flag-Version and by default is set to Off

output_formats.title: Output formats
output_formats.text:
Results returned from the server can be provided in the following formats: [OUTPUT_FORMATS].

All formats - except 'JSON' - return coalesced segments.
